ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Master Yael and Nortlav the Scale Keeper - how do you do 'em?
ygData.msgSnippet: According to posts on the Backstage - Nortlav was toned down a bit - the Lifetap now is just damage (ie doesn t transfer the HP s back to himself) Slyde ...
ygData.messageBody:
According to posts on the Backstage - Nortlav was toned down a bit - the
Lifetap now is just damage (ie doesn't transfer the HP's back to himself)

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher M Andrews [mailto:cmandy_drew@...]
Sent: Monday, July 30, 2001 2:54 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Master Yael and Nortlav the Scale Keeper - how do
you do 'em?


Yael has uber aggro range. I highly doubt that you can take the scalekeeper
without Yael having a hissy. When we went there, we fought Yael right on his
spawn point with no interference from Nortlav. People say that Nortlav
aggros on golems and regular stuff there. He's supposed to be coded "beta
